attributes.action: Lower the price of Premier League football tickets.
attributes.additional_details:
In recent times, the Barclays Premier League has vastly expanded its global reach and popularity among football fans all over the world. This in turn gives the chance for the F.A and football clubs to increase prices because there is a high demand for them.

However, the recent inexplicable climb in ticket prices is a complete exploitation of the consumers. Football fans should not have to pay a sizeable amount of the salary to see their beloved team play every week.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football authorities, although the Government does monitor the situation.
